title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5323.19 - Temporary permission to operate table games or table game features
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5323.19 - Temporary permission to operate table games or table game features

State Regulations

The commission, by directive, may authorize the temporary
operation of a table game or table game feature for the purpose of determining
whether such game or feature should be authorized on a permanent basis. The
rules of such table game or table game feature shall be posted on the
commission's website and shall be made available for inspection by the gaming
facility in the manner set forth in section
5323.14
of this Part. Any such
temporary authorization shall not exceed 270 days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5323.19

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
